page.title: 18The Hillingdon Show
page.content: The Shows Golden Jubilee was held this year in 1985 on the Penultimate weekend of June.It took place near Hillingdon Ski Centre and Hillingdon House farm and about 40,000 people attended.Hillingdon is Londons only county show.Next year,it will become the Middlesex Show because the show is now county size.There were about 250 trade stalls .There were also many charity stalls including Scouts and animal welfare.Many other stalls sold art and craft items.There were displays from the Royal Navy,Royal Marines,the Kings Troop Royal Horse Artillery,Metropolitan Police,Royal Air Force Police Dog Team,British Gas and a Wessex Naval helicopter.There was also a farming and horticultural area.
